name: Flying Cow (up2060618, up2042483, Team Screen)
description:
Left Click to make the cow fly upwards, and avoid hitting the spiked fences!

By up2060618 and up2042483

We followed a tutorial in order to make the game and we also have some sound files off the internet, below are links to where we got our audio and the videos we followed to make the game. All the designs are our own, aside from the farm background which is a default backdrop design featured in Scratch.
